name: Ext.form.action.Action
doc:
The subclasses of this class provide actions to perform upon Forms.

Instances of this class are only created by a Form when the Form needs to perform an action such as submit or load. The Configuration options listed for this class are set through the Form's action methods: submit, load and doAction

The instance of Action which performed the action is passed to the success and failure callbacks of the Form's action methods (submit, load and doAction), and to the actioncomplete and actionfailed event handlers.

members.name: failure
members.doc: The function to call when a failure packet was received, or when an error occurred in the Ajax communication.

properties.name: action
properties.doc:
The Action class. If an Ajax error occurred, the failure type will be in failureType. The result property of this object may be examined to perform custom post-processing.

@declarativeHandler

members.short_doc:
The function to call when a failure packet was received, or when an error
occurred in the Ajax communication. ...

members.name: form
members.doc: The BasicForm instance that is invoking this Action. Required.
members.short_doc: The BasicForm instance that is invoking this Action. ...

members.name: headers
members.doc:
Extra headers to be sent in the AJAX request for submit and load actions. See Ext.data.proxy.Ajax.headers.

Note: Headers are not sent during file upload.
members.short_doc: Extra headers to be sent in the AJAX request for submit and load actions. ...

members.name: method
members.doc: The HTTP method to use to access the requested URL. Defaults to the BasicForm's method, or 'POST' if not specified.
members.short_doc: The HTTP method to use to access the requested URL. ...

members.name: params
members.doc:
Extra parameter values to pass. These are added to the Form's Ext.form.Basic.baseParams and passed to the specified URL along with the Form's input fields.

Parameters are encoded as standard HTTP parameters using Ext.Object.toQueryString.
members.short_doc: Extra parameter values to pass. ...

members.name: reset
members.doc: When set to true, causes the Form to be reset on Action success. If specified, this happens before the success callback is called and before the Form's actioncomplete event fires.
members.short_doc: When set to true, causes the Form to be reset on Action success. ...

members.name: scope
members.doc: The scope in which to call the configured success and failure callback functions (the this reference for the callback functions).
members.short_doc:
The scope in which to call the configured success and failure callback functions
(the this reference for the callback...

members.name: submitEmptyText
members.doc: If set to true, the emptyText value will be sent with the form when it is submitted.
members.short_doc: If set to true, the emptyText value will be sent with the form when it is submitted. ...

members.name: success
members.doc: The function to call when a valid success return packet is received.

properties.name: action
properties.doc:
The Action class. The result property of this object may be examined to perform custom post-processing.

@declarativeHandler

members.short_doc: The function to call when a valid success return packet is received. ...

members.name: timeout
members.doc: The number of seconds to wait for a server response before failing with the failureType as CONNECT_FAILURE. If not specified, defaults to the configured timeout of the form.
members.short_doc:
The number of seconds to wait for a server response before failing with the failureType as
CONNECT_FAILURE. ...

members.name: url
members.doc: The URL that the Action is to invoke. Will default to the url configured on the form.
members.short_doc: The URL that the Action is to invoke. ...

members.name: waitMsg
members.doc: The message to be displayed by a call to Ext.window.MessageBox.wait during the time the action is being processed.

members.name: waitTitle
members.doc: The title to be displayed by a call to Ext.window.MessageBox.wait during the time the action is being processed.

members.name: failureType
members.doc:
The type of failure detected will be one of these: CLIENT_INVALID, SERVER_INVALID, CONNECT_FAILURE, or LOAD_FAILURE.

Usage:

var fp = new Ext.form.Panel({
...
buttons: [{
    text: 'Save',
    formBind: true,
    handler: function(){
        if(fp.getForm().isValid()){
            fp.getForm().submit({
                url: 'form-submit.php',
                waitMsg: 'Submitting your data...',
                success: function(form, action){
                    // server responded with success = true
                    var result = action.result;
                },
                failure: function(form, action){
                    if (action.failureType === Ext.form.action.Action.CONNECT_FAILURE) {
                        Ext.Msg.alert('Error',
                            'Status:'+action.response.status+': '+
                            action.response.statusText);
                    }
                    if (action.failureType === Ext.form.action.Action.SERVER_INVALID){
                        // server responded with success = false
                        Ext.Msg.alert('Invalid', action.result.errormsg);
                    }
                }
            });
        }
    }
},{
    text: 'Reset',
    handler: function(){
        fp.getForm().reset();
    }
}]
members.short_doc:
The type of failure detected will be one of these:
CLIENT_INVALID, SERVER_INVALID, CONNECT_FAILURE, or LOAD_FAILURE. ...

members.name: response
members.doc: The raw XMLHttpRequest object used to perform the action.

members.name: result
members.doc: The decoded response object containing a boolean success property and other, action-specific properties.

members.name: type
members.doc: The type of action this Action instance performs. Currently only "submit" and "load" are supported.
members.short_doc: The type of action this Action instance performs. ...

members.name: CLIENT_INVALID
members.doc: Failure type returned when client side validation of the Form fails thus aborting a submit action. Client side validation is performed unless Ext.form.action.Submit.clientValidation is explicitly set to false.
members.short_doc: Failure type returned when client side validation of the Form fails thus aborting a submit action. ...

members.name: CONNECT_FAILURE
members.doc: Failure type returned when a communication error happens when attempting to send a request to the remote server. The response may be examined to provide further information.
members.short_doc:
Failure type returned when a communication error happens when attempting to send a request to the remote
server. ...

members.name: LOAD_FAILURE
members.doc: Failure type returned when the response's success property is set to false, or no field values are returned in the response's data property.
members.short_doc:
Failure type returned when the response's success property is set to false, or no field values are returned
in the re...

members.name: SERVER_INVALID
members.doc:
Failure type returned when server side processing fails and the result's success property is set to false.

In the case of a form submission, field-specific error messages may be returned in the result's errors property.
members.short_doc:
Failure type returned when server side processing fails and the result's success property is set to
false. ...

members.name: constructor
members.doc: Creates new Action.
members.short_doc: Creates new Action. ...

members.name: createCallback
members.doc: Creates a callback object.
members.short_doc: Creates a callback object. ...

members.name: getMethod
members.doc: Determine the HTTP method to be used for the request.
members.short_doc: Determine the HTTP method to be used for the request. ...

members.name: getParams
members.doc: Get the set of parameters specified in the BasicForm's baseParams and/or the params option. Items in params override items of the same name in baseParams.
members.short_doc: Get the set of parameters specified in the BasicForm's baseParams and/or the params option. ...

members.name: getUrl
members.doc: Build the URL for the AJAX request. Used by the standard AJAX submit and load actions.
members.short_doc: Build the URL for the AJAX request. ...

members.name: handleResponse
members.doc: Handles the raw response and builds a result object from it. Must be implemented by subclasses.
members.short_doc: Handles the raw response and builds a result object from it. ...

members.name: onFailure
members.doc: Handles a failure response.
members.short_doc: Handles a failure response. ...

members.name: onSuccess
members.doc: Callback method that gets invoked when the action completes successfully. Must be implemented by subclasses.
members.short_doc: Callback method that gets invoked when the action completes successfully. ...

members.name: processResponse
members.doc: Validates that a response contains either responseText or responseXML and invokes handleResponse to build the result object.

return.name: return
return.doc: The result object as built by handleResponse, or true if the response had empty responseText and responseXML.

members.short_doc:
Validates that a response contains either responseText or responseXML and invokes
handleResponse to build the result ...

members.name: run
members.doc: Invokes this action using the current configuration.
members.short_doc: Invokes this action using the current configuration. ...

short_doc: The subclasses of this class provide actions to perform upon Forms. ...
